header.title: Delivery locations
header.subtitle: Keep the AU condo list fresh so diners can tap once and see the correct fee range.

form.title: Add new condo
form.description: Give each condo a fee range and optionally list out the building labels diners will see.
form.buildingsEmpty: Add at least one building name.

list.title: Delivery coverage

edit.title: Edit delivery condo
